title.rendered: Abrams for Governor Statement on Judicial Order in One Georgia Case

content.rendered:
ATLANTA — Today, Abrams for Governor campaign manager Lauren Groh-Wargo issued the following statement:

“It is more urgent than ever that our supporters go to staceyabrams.com and give whatever they can.”

###
